name: FreshMeat
description:
This game is made for Leap day game Jam.

Team : Arastu : programmer , designer

Raviraj : programmer , Concept

Sumanth : Art.

A 2D Platformer with satisfying action and Art. In which u pick up chicken legs to make your weapon huge.  Pick all 5 to become unstoppable. 

Requires great timing skills to attack.

How to play:

A/D or arrow keys - movement left/Right

K or left mouse click - Attack
